entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having Shell NavBar Visible shortens visible part of the page on the bottom #14914
  • XamlParseException when using dependency injection #14911
  • Entry control border still visible when full keyboard access enabled on MacOS #14909
    Backlog

Closed

  • Change border content to fontawesome image #14903
  • Error reading response from wcf service in basicHttpBinding #14836
  • Can't center CollectionView within a VerticalLayout or StackLayout on iOS #14731
    Backlog
  • 7.0.81 Service Release 4 Serious Layout Problem #14849
  • Wrong XAML error messages using Hot Reload #13050
  • StackLayout HorizontalOptions & VerticalOptions do nothing. #14749
  • Multi Columns Grid Height wrong on iOS / Android #14792
  • ".NET MAUI" is not Listed as Project Template on Visual Studio 2022 Community #14890
    .NET 8

PullRequests

Created

  • Use default StepFrequency and SmallChange values for WinUI slider #14912
  • Investigations and fixes for the Foo #14910
  • [Android] Changes updating ImageButton Padding to avoid size issues #14905
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #14902
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid

Merged

  • Update net7.0 version ref to 7.0.86 #14913
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.5.0 to 1.5.0.1 #14888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [core] use StringComparer for Dictionary/HashSet #14900
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net7.0] Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14841
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.1 to 2.5.3.2 #14880
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Move main to use macOS Ventura machines #14901
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.2 to 1.3.1.3 #14879
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0 to 1.3.0.1 #14878
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1 to 1.6.1.1 #14884
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0 to 1.8.0.1 #14877
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.2 to 2.6.1.1 #14886
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.16 to 1.0.0.17 #14881
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Remove view from previous containerview #14867
    platform/android 🤖, partner/cat 😻
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Update AndroidX #14892
  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.11 to 1.1.0.12 #14876
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Correctly notify ImageButton border changes #14874
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
